title: The SRS Classes
description: An educational platform for BPSC and other competitive exams.
longDescription: A complete educational ecosystem featuring courses, notices, and review systems. Built to handle scale and provide a seamless learning experience for aspirants.

title: CryptoFolio
longDescription: CryptoFolio is a full-stack web application that allows users to track cryptocurrencies, view real-time prices, and manage their crypto portfolio efficiently. The app focuses on performance, clean UI, and scalable backend architecture.
